dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3081114P] Trademark Infringement (Uncoverthe.net)
dmca.body:
Dear Mr. Walters: The disputed material in the below-pasted complaint is the domain name, not the content of the website. As an ISP, we are compelled by Federal Law to disable access of website if it infringes copyright or trademark rights of third parties. This is not the case since the website www.uncoverthe.net neither uses the Trademark UNCOVER THE NET on his website nor has UNCOVER THE NET content display there. As the disputed material is the domain name and it is not under our control, because it was not registered with us. This issue should be resolved either by the registrar of the domain name uncoverthe.net or ICANN. Legal Response Team -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Wednesday, February 14, 2007 7:55 AM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3081114P] Trademark Infringement (Uncoverthe.net) ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Trademark Infringement (Uncoverthe.net) Added by system at Wednesday, Feb 14 2007 01:51 pm X-MailFrom: shawn@uncoverthenet.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed Feb 14 13:51:19 2007 Received: (qmail 21341 invoked by alias); 14 Feb 2007 19:51:19 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 21338 invoked from network); 14 Feb 2007 19:51:19 -0000 Received: from unknown (HELO DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL) (172.16.220.10) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 14 Feb 2007 19:51:19 -0000 Received: from Exchanger.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.101]) by DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 14 Feb 2007 13:50:19 -0600 Received: from mailin.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.124]) by Exchanger.ev1servers.net with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 14 Feb 2007 13:50:19 -0600 X-ASG-Debug-ID: 1171482613-25652-920-0 X-Barracuda-URL: http://207.218.222.124:8000/cgi-bin/mark.cgi X-ASG-Recipient-Whitelist: abuse@ev1servers.net Received: from host2.uncoverthenet.com (unknown [209.59.172.218]) by mailin.ev1servers.net (Spam Firewall) with ESMTP id D269753BE8 for ; Wed, 14 Feb 2007 13:50:18 -0600 (CST) Received: from c-67-184-4-36.hsd1.il.comcast.net ([67.184.4.36]:51160 helo=[192.168.1.101]) by host2.uncoverthenet.com with esmtp (Exim 4.63) (envelope-from ) id 1HHQ8q-0001Vr-Se; Wed, 14 Feb 2007 13:50:13 -0600 Mime-Version: 1.0 (Apple Message framework v752.3) To: abuse@ev1servers.net, webmaster@beautifuldomains.com Message-Id: <67021A00-8142-4518-8880-899B03A5BA1F@uncoverthenet.com> Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary=Apple-Mail-19--98126593 From: Shawn Walters X-ASG-Orig-Subj: Trademark Infringement (Uncoverthe.net) Subject: Trademark Infringement (Uncoverthe.net) Date: Wed, 14 Feb 2007 13:50:01 -0600 X-Mailer: Apple Mail (2.752.3) X-ClamAntiVirus-Scanner: This mail is clean X-AntiAbuse: This header was added to track abuse, please include it with any abuse report X-AntiAbuse: Primary Hostname - host2.uncoverthenet.com X-AntiAbuse: Original Domain - ev1servers.net X-AntiAbuse: Originator/Caller UID/GID - [0 0] / [47 12] X-AntiAbuse: Sender Address Domain - uncoverthenet.com X-Source: X-Source-Args: X-Source-Dir: X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED Return-Path: shawn@uncoverthenet.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 14 Feb 2007 19:50:19.0420 (UTC) FILETIME=[5B27A5C0:01C75071] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) To Whom it may concern, We, UTN Enterprises Inc, own the trademarked name "Uncover the Net" in the search engine/web directory vertical. Please see below for the trademark information which can be also found on the USPTO. Word Mark UNCOVER THE NET Goods and Services IC 035. US 100 101 102. G & S: Providing an online business directory featuring a wide variety of businesses. FIRST USE: 20041001. FIRST USE IN COMMERCE: 20041007 IC 042. US 100 101. G & S: Computer services, namely, providing search engines for obtaining data on the Internet. FIRST USE: 20041001. FIRST USE IN COMMERCE: 20041007 Standard Characters Claimed Mark Drawing Code (4) STANDARD CHARACTER MARK Design Search Code Serial Number 78593784 Filing Date March 23, 2005 Current Filing Basis 1A Original Filing Basis 1A Published for Opposition October 17, 2006 Registration Number 3191259 Registration Date January 2, 2007 Owner (REGISTRANT) UTN Enterprises Inc CORPORATION UNITED STATES Attorney of Record CHARLES F. MERONI, JR. Type of Mark SERVICE MARK Register PRINCIPAL Live/Dead Indicator LIVE The website currently hosted at your server (www.uncoverthe.net) infringes on our federally registered trademark. We ask that this website be disabled immediately. We will proceed with legal action if this infringement is not corrected. I have a good faith belief that the use of the Infringing Material is not authorized by the Owner, its agents or the law. The information in this Notice of Copyright Infringement is accurate and under penalty of perjury, I am authorized to act on behalf of the Owner. Should you require any further information regarding this matter, please contact me at the address, telephone number, fax number, or email address indicated below: Sincerely, Shawn M. Walters Uncover the Net / UTN Enterprises, Inc. 2549 W Golf Rd | Suite 119 | Hoffman Estates, IL 60169 www.uncoverthenet.com shawn@uncoverthenet.com Direct: 630-675-6135 Fax: 801-601-6135 bcc:/ Charles F. Meroni Jr. MIME element (text/html) To Whom it may concern,

We, UTN Enterprises Inc, own the trademarked name "Uncover the Net" in the search engine/web directory vertical.
